what: Standard Frequency Tables in R — frequencies
title: Standard Frequency Tables in R — frequencies
Standard Frequency Tables in R — frequencies
code: frequencies(   x = NULL,   weights = NULL,   n.classes = NULL,   lower.limit = NULL,   upper.limit = NULL,   time.breaks = NULL,   svy.design = NULL,   sort.decreasing = NULL,   tidy.breaks = FALSE,   na.count = TRUE,   n.digits = 2,   show.totals = TRUE,   show.percent = TRUE,   use.thousands.mark = FALSE,   as.markdown = FALSE,   as.categorical = FALSE,   compare.valids = FALSE,   show.relative = TRUE,   show.cumulative = FALSE,   show.rel.cumulative = FALSE,   show.frequencies = TRUE )

title: Standard Frequency Tables in R — frequencies
text: x Vector data.frame. numeric categorical variable type. weights Numeric. Weights aggregating categories x. length x. n.classes Integer numeric. single integer, represents number classes numeric variable. vector numeric values, represent desired break points classes. Defaults number classes determined Herbert Sturges algorithm. lower.limit Numeric. Lower classes limit. Along n.classes, determines bins distribution continuous variables. Defaults minimum value numeric vector. upper.limit Numeric. Lower classes limit. Along n.classes, determines bins distribution continuous variables. Defaults maximum value numeric vector. time.breaks Character integer. Specifies aggregation class date-time variables: "secs", "mins", "hours", "days", "weeks", "months","years", "DSTdays" "quarters". integer specifies arbitrary number classes observations. svy.design survey.design object. survey design object survey::package. sort.decreasing NULL logical. sort frequencies decreasingly, increasingly according frequency counts. default, NULL, sorts frequencies according classes. tidy.breaks Logical. Uses default classes histograms, allowing frequency table numeric values match default graphical bins histogram. overrides value n.classes. na.count Logical. include NA values part classes counted. vector missing values report 0 occurrences TRUE selected. n.digits Integer. number decimal places display percentage frequencies. number decimals shown relative frequencies n.digits + 2. show.totals Logical. Show sum frequencies relative/percentage frequencies. show.percent Logical. Show relative frequencies percentage frequencies. Default TRUE. use.thousands.mark Logical. Show thousands mark numeric columns. Warning: numeric variables stored character. .markdown Logical. Return frequency table RMarkdown format, uses pander:: package. .categorical Logical. TRUE, display integer value different category. FALSE, aggregate integer values classes unique values greater 15. Useful displaying variables several categories,  Default FALSE. compare.valids Logical. Show hide additional column column type compare valid vs. NA values, default FALSE. overrides selected option na.count argument. show.relative Logical. Show hide column relative frequencies, default TRUE. show.cumulative Logical. Show hide column cumulative frequencies, default FALSE show.rel.cumulative Logical. Show hide column relative cumulative frequencies, default FALSE. show.frequencies Logical. Show hide column counts per class, default TRUE.
